type: LOGISTICS SERVICES FOR MAJOR EVENTS, COMMEMORATIONS AND CEREMONIES
short_summary: The Department of Canadian Heritage requires the above work to be performed in accordance with the Statement of Work attached as Appendix
description: The services will be required on an as and when required basis for a period of three (3) years from the date of issuance of a Standing Offer, with the option to extend the duration by two (2) periods of one year each All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Standing Offer Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) closing date.
duration_in_months: One (3) years with the option to extend the duration by two (2) periods of one year each
